Notes on string functions for minimalist parser

String functions

by Eva P. Aug 23, 2017

Merge 1-2

(xy,a,b) <- (x,a) (y,b) (xy,a,b) <- (y,b) (x,a)

Move 1

(xy,a,b) <- (y,x,a,b)

where y,a,b must precede x linearly and do not overlap Because of the string function for Move 1, we can guarantee this.

Merge 3

(x,y,a,b) <- (x,a) (y,b) (x,y,a,b) <- (y,b) (x,a)

Move 2

(x,y,a,b) <- (x,y,a,b)
